greeting: Greetings from The On-Line Encyclopedia of Integer Sequences! http://oeis.org/

results.name: Denominator of Cotesian number C(n,0).
reference: Charles Jordan, Calculus of Finite Differences, Chelsea 1965, p. 513.
mathematica: cn[n_, 0] := Sum[n^j*StirlingS1[n, j]/(j + 1), {j, 1, n + 1}]/n!; cn[n_, n_] := cn[n, 0]; cn[n_, k_] := 1/n!*Binomial[n, k]*Sum[n^(j + m)*StirlingS1[k, j]*StirlingS1[n - k, m]/((m + 1)*Binomial[j + m + 1, m + 1]), {m, 1, n}, {j, 1, k + 1}]; Table[cn[n, 0] // Denominator, {n, 0, 23}] (* _Jean-François Alcover_, Jan 16 2013 *)
results.author: _N. J. A. Sloane_, Dec 04 2004
